ygData.msgSnippet: There are so many computer games out there to choose from. But the quality is, if anything, getting worse. With more and more requiring patches. I don t think
ygData.messageBody:
There are so many computer games out there to choose from. But the
quality is, if anything, getting worse. With more and more requiring
patches. I don't think competition will fix the problem, only the
consumers decisions will.

> >from it. When Asheron's Call comes out and other MPRPGs start popping up,
